name: Trivial Su-Persuit
description:
Trivial Su-Persuit

The evil villain Braniac wants to steal all the intelligence from the city of Pittsburgh. As Captain Amygdala, defeat Braniac's henchmen by answering correct trivia about Pittsburgh, before taking on Branian himself. 

Controls:

Use "WASD" to move

"WA" - forward and backward

"SD" to turn

Features:

  • 3D
  • Trivia Questions
  • Superhero
  • Collectable

This is a student project for INFSCI1061 at the University of Pittsburgh
